plugins.name: Natural Language Dates
plugins.author: Argentina Ortega Sainz
plugins.description: Create date-links based on natural language
plugins.introduction: Use natural language to create date-links in your Obsidian notes. For example, typing "next Monday" will create a link to the date corresponding to the next Monday. This plugin helps you quickly reference dates without needing to remember specific formats or manually calculate them.

annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.name: Natural Language Dates
annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.description: Create date-links based on natural language
annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.author: Argentina Ortega Sainz

plugins.name: Notebook Navigator
plugins.author: Johan Sanneblad
plugins.description: Replace the default file explorer with a clean two-pane interface featuring folder tree, tag browsing, file previews, keyboard navigation, drag-and-drop, pinned notes, and customizable display options.
plugins.introduction: This plugin replaces the default file explorer in Obsidian with a clean two-pane interface. The left pane features a folder tree and tag browser, while the right pane provides file previews. It supports keyboard navigation, drag-and-drop functionality, pinned notes, and customizable display options to enhance your note organization and navigation experience.

annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.name: Notebook Navigator
annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.description: Replace the default file explorer with a clean two-pane interface featuring folder tree, tag browsing, file previews, keyboard navigation, drag-and-drop, pinned notes, and customizable display options.
annotations.vnd.obsidianmd.plugin.author: Johan Sanneblad

plugins.name: Shard Installer
plugins.author: Andrew Gillis
plugins.description: Browse and install Obsidian plugins from GitHub Container Registry repositories
plugins.introduction: Shard Installer brings a modern plugin distribution system to Obsidian. Built on the Open Container Initiative (OCI) standards and GitHub Container Registry, it enables seamless discovery and installation of Obsidian plugins from containerized repositories.

annotations.org.opencontainers.image.description: Browse and install Obsidian plugins from GitHub Container Registry repositories
